item.title: Hello Internet!
item.description:
Hello internet!

This website was created using hugo. It is hosted on a nuc running on nixos, it’s entirely declaritive! Have a look at the source code for the static part of the site over here: https://github.com/MartV0/personal-site, and the nix source code here: https://github.com/MartV0/homelab/.
